titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Class of 1877, Yale College, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:29

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of reunion photographs; a letter from the class secretary, Charles S. Miller; and addresses of class members maintained by Arthur Wells Cole documenting the Yale College Class of 1877. Included is Cole's account book while a student at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 10-A (YRG 10-A), Records of Yale College classes.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were a gift of Albert and Lois Hough, 2002.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Class of 1877, Yale College, Records (RU 909). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reunion photographs; a letter from the class secretary, Charles S. Miller; and addresses of class members maintained by Arthur Wells Cole documenting the Yale College Class of 1877. Included is Cole's account book while a student at Yale.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

did.unittitle: Records and photographs of the Class of 1877 featuring Arthur Wells Cole
letter from the class secretary, Charles S. Miller
addresses of class members maintained by Arthur Wells Cole
